Text: Shreemant Chimaji Ballal Peshwa (aka Chimaji Appa)(1707–1740) was the son of Balaji Vishwanath Bhat and the younger brother of Bajirao Peshwa of Maratha Empire.
Triplets:<Shreemant Chimaji
1:
<Text: Chimaji Appa:  He was an able military commander who liberated the western coast of India from Portuguese rule.>
